Description: Come up with initial milestones for getting started
set up lex file structure and identify tokens for variables
set up bison structure and parse tokens of variables
set up cpp files and translate variables to python
add support for unary functions
add support for the following operators: && || < > ==
add support for global variables
add a stack that can be acessed in all expressions
add suport for if, while and else
Add support for functions with many input parameters
add suport for function calls
Replace the static stack by a stack structure that allows scoping
Implement scoping by creating a context class and passing it in code_gen
Set up the code stucture so that code gen funcions can be easily implemented
Write an automated system for running test cases
Write the tests required for the testsuite
Implement code_gen to compile a funciotn with a return statement
Make sure we are meeting the spec for translation and passing all test from formative feedback
Implement code_gen for all remaining operators - assignment unary coditional and relational
Create tests for all operators
Parse all operators for C
Compile and test if else statements
Compile and test for and while statements
Compile and test continue and break statements
Compile and test switch statement
Compile all non unary and non postfix operators
Add bindings to functions to allow function calls
Instead of using consecutive registers for a statement, each expression needs to save into memory allowing expressions to be binded together
Compile globals - create a data section and create a way of distinguishing between globals and scopes
compile function calls - both nullary and with many parameters. Get rid of nullaryfunctionInvocation and parse both as one
Compile and test go to statements
Compile and test local arrays - declarations, invocations and assignments
Compile and test pointers - declarations, address operator and indirection operator
Implement self recursion
Be able to pass pointers to functions as arguments
Parse and compile character and short data types in everywhere including return types and operations
Add const and volatile specifiers
